task_description: Facing the building to your North-East (approx. 47°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: I need to see the entire building to estimate its height, but the top is currently cut off, so I will look up.
I have seen the top of the building, and now I need to see the base to estimate the full height, so I will look down.
I have now seen the top and the base of the building; it appears to be about 7 stories high, and assuming each story is approximately 3.5 meters, the total height is around 24.5 meters.
